verses.verse: Now Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> the Gileadite <S%H1569><s%> was a mighty <S%H1368><s%> man of valor, <S%H2428><s%> and he was the son <S%H1121><s%> of an harlot: <S%H2181><s%> and Gilead <S%H1568><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Jephthah. <S%H3316><s%>

And Gilead's <S%H1568><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> him sons; <S%H1121><s%> and his wife's <S%H802><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> grew <S%H1431><s%> up, and they thrust <S%H1644><s%> out Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, You shall not inherit <S%H5157><s%> in our father's <S%H1><s%> house; <S%H1004><s%> for you are the son <S%H1121><s%> of a strange <S%H312><s%> woman. <S%H802><s%>

Then Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> fled <S%H1272><s%> from his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Tob: <S%H2897><s%> and there were gathered <S%H3950><s%> vain <S%H7386><s%> men <S%H582><s%> to Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> and went <S%H3318><s%> out with him.
And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass in process of time, <S%H3117><s%> that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> made war <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it was so, that when <S%H834><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> made war <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to fetch <S%H3947><s%> Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Tob: <S%H2897><s%>
And they said <S%H559><s%> to Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> Come, <S%H3212><s%> and be our captain, <S%H7101><s%> that we may fight <S%H3898><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%>

And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> Did not you hate <S%H8130><s%> me, and expel <S%H1644><s%> me out of my father's <S%H1><s%> house? <S%H1004><s%> and why <S%H4069><s%> are you come <S%H935><s%> to me now <S%H6258><s%> when <S%H834><s%> you are in distress? <S%H6887><s%>

And the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> Therefore we turn <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> to you now, <S%H6258><s%> that you may go <S%H1980><s%> with us, and fight <S%H3898><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and be our head <S%H7218><s%> over all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>

And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> If <S%H518><s%> you bring <S%H7725><s%> me home <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> deliver <S%H5414><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> me, shall I be your head? <S%H7218><s%>

And the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> be witness <S%H8085><s%> between <S%H996><s%> us, if <S%H518><s%> we do <S%H6213><s%> not so <S%H3651><s%> according to your words. <S%H1697><s%>

Then Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> with the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> made <S%H7760><s%> him head <S%H7218><s%> and captain <S%H7101><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them: and Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> uttered <S%H1696><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his words <S%H1697><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in Mizpeh. <S%H4709><s%>

And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> have you to do with me, that you are come <S%H935><s%> against <S%H413><s%> me to fight <S%H3898><s%> in my land? <S%H776><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> to the messengers <S%H4397><s%> of Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> away my land, <S%H776><s%> when they came <S%H5927><s%> up out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from Arnon <S%H769><s%> even to Jabbok, <S%H2999><s%> and to Jordan: <S%H3383><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> therefore restore <S%H7725><s%> those lands again <S%H7725><s%> peaceably. <S%H7965><s%>
And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H5750><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon: <S%H5983><s%>

And said <S%H559><s%> to him, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> not away the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> nor the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon: <S%H5983><s%>

But when Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and walked <S%H3212><s%> through the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Kadesh; <S%H6946><s%>

Then Israel <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Edom, <S%H123><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Let me, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, pass <S%H5674><s%> through your land: <S%H776><s%> but the king <S%H4428><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%> would not listen <S%H8085><s%> thereto. And in like <S%H1571><s%> manner they sent <S%H7971><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab: <S%H4124><s%> but he would <S%H14><s%> not consent: <S%H14><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> stayed <S%H3427><s%> in Kadesh. <S%H6946><s%>

Then they went <S%H3212><s%> along through the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and compassed <S%H5437><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom, <S%H123><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> by the east <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%> side of the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> on the other <S%H5676><s%> side <S%H5676><s%> of Arnon, <S%H769><s%> but came <S%H935><s%> not within the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab: <S%H4124><s%> for Arnon <S%H769><s%> was the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon; <S%H2809><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Let us pass, <S%H5674><s%> we pray <S%H4994><s%> you, through your land <S%H776><s%> into <S%H5704><s%> my place. <S%H4725><s%>

But Sihon <S%H5511><s%> trusted <S%H539><s%> not Israel <S%H3478><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through his coast: <S%H1366><s%> but Sihon <S%H5511><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> together, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in Jahaz, <S%H3096><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and they smote <S%H5221><s%> them: so Israel <S%H3478><s%> possessed <S%H3423><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of that country. <S%H776><s%>

And they possessed <S%H3423><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> from Arnon <S%H769><s%> even to Jabbok, <S%H2999><s%> and from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> even to Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

So now <S%H6258><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> has dispossessed <S%H3423><s%> the Amorites <S%H567><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and should you possess <S%H3423><s%> it?

Will not you possess <S%H3423><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> Chemosh <S%H3645><s%> your god <S%H430><s%> gives you to possess? <S%H3423><s%> So whomsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> shall drive <S%H3423><s%> out from before <S%H6440><s%> us, them will we possess. <S%H3423><s%>

And now <S%H6258><s%> are you any thing better <S%H2896><s%> than Balak <S%H1111><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zippor, <S%H6834><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab? <S%H4124><s%> did he ever strive <S%H7378><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or did he ever fight <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> them,

While Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> and her towns, <S%H1323><s%> and in Aroer <S%H6177><s%> and her towns, <S%H1323><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> that be along by the coasts <S%H3027><s%> of Arnon, <S%H769><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years? <S%H8141><s%> why <S%H4069><s%> therefore did you not recover <S%H5337><s%> them within that time? <S%H6256><s%>

Why I have not sinned <S%H2398><s%> against you, but you do <S%H6213><s%> me wrong <S%H7451><s%> to war <S%H3898><s%> against me: the LORD <S%H3068><s%> the Judge <S%H8199><s%> be judge <S%H8199><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%>

However, the king <S%H4428><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> listened <S%H8085><s%> not to the words <S%H1697><s%> of Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he sent <S%H7971><s%> him.

Then the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> on Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> and he passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and from Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> he passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%>

And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> vowed <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> If <S%H518><s%> you shall without fail deliver <S%H5414><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> into my hands, <S%H3027><s%>

Then it shall be, that whatever <S%H834><s%> comes <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> of the doors <S%H1817><s%> of my house <S%H1004><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> me, when I return <S%H7725><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> shall surely be the LORD's, <S%H3068><s%> and I will offer <S%H5927><s%> it up for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering.

So Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against them; and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into his hands. <S%H3027><s%>

And he smote <S%H5221><s%> them from Aroer, <S%H6177><s%> even till <S%H5704><s%> you come <S%H935><s%> to Minnith, <S%H4511><s%> even twenty <S%H6242><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and to the plain <S%H58><s%> of the vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> with a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter. <S%H4347><s%> Thus the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> were subdued <S%H3665><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Mizpeh <S%H4709><s%> to his house, <S%H1004><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out to meet <S%H7125><s%> him with tambourines <S%H8596><s%> and with dances: <S%H4246><s%> and she was his only <S%H3173><s%> child; <S%H3173><s%> beside her he had neither <S%H369><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> nor <S%H176><s%> daughter. <S%H1323><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when he saw <S%H7200><s%> her, that he rent <S%H7167><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Alas, <S%H162><s%> my daughter! <S%H1323><s%> you have brought <S%H3766><s%> me very low, <S%H3766><s%> and you are one of them that trouble <S%H5916><s%> me: for I have opened <S%H6475><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and I cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> go <S%H7725><s%> back. <S%H7725><s%>

And she said <S%H559><s%> to him, My father, <S%H1><s%> if you have opened <S%H6475><s%> your mouth <S%H6310><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to me according to that which <S%H834><s%> has proceeded <S%H3318><s%> out of your mouth; <S%H6310><s%> for as much <S%H310><s%> <S%H834><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has taken <S%H6213><s%> vengeance <S%H5360><s%> for you of your enemies, <S%H341><s%> even of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%>

And she said <S%H559><s%> to her father, <S%H1><s%> Let this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> be done <S%H6213><s%> for me: let me alone <S%H7503><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> months, <S%H2320><s%> that I may go <S%H3212><s%> up and down <S%H3381><s%> on the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and mourn <S%H1058><s%> my virginity, <S%H1331><s%> I and my fellows. <S%H7464><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Go. <S%H3212><s%> And he sent <S%H7971><s%> her away for two <S%H8147><s%> months: <S%H2320><s%> and she went <S%H3212><s%> with her companions, <S%H7464><s%> and bewailed <S%H1058><s%> her virginity <S%H1331><s%> on the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass at the end <S%H7093><s%> of two <S%H8147><s%> months, <S%H2320><s%> that she returned <S%H7725><s%> to her father, <S%H1><s%> who did <S%H6213><s%> with her according to his vow <S%H5088><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had vowed: <S%H5087><s%> and she knew <S%H3045><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> man. <S%H376><s%> And it was a custom <S%H2706><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

That the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> yearly <S%H3117><s%> to lament <S%H8567><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> the Gileadite <S%H1569><s%> four <S%H702><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> in a year. <S%H8141><s%>
